channel.title: Players log in and Died
channel.description:
Hello moparscapers i need some help.
When my players log in they died and lose everything how can i fix that glitch?

item.title: Players log in and Died
item.dc:creator: @noobie22 Noobie22
item.description:
@noobie22 wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]No, it’s a combat glitch.

It has nothing to do with the player count, nor player updating methods.[/quote]

Just a theory bro.

This is pointless spamming, not going to bother replying.

Read full topic

item.title: Players log in and Died
item.dc:creator: @noobie22 Noobie22
item.description:
@noobie22 wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”][quote author=Noobie22 link=topic=450190.msg3302389#msg3302389 date=1281397117]

It’s a glitch in the combat.

It would happen anywhere.

Yes, a simple boolean would cause people to stop losing items in Varrock, but what about the rest of the world?

It’s the combat, not the city.

I know that but he said it’s mainly happening in varrock. So just giving a simple fix would be the stupid thing to do, but it works.

He really should re write combat though not only for this glitch, it would really boost PvP
[/quote]Has it occurred to you that it mainly happens in Varrock, as that is the busiest city?

Or possibly, people don’t roam around the world?

It has nothing to do with the city, as it will still happen everywhere else.[/quote]

He said Varrock is his “home”. It happens everywhere obviously, but i think its a player count glitch?

Read full topic

item.title: Players log in and Died
item.dc:creator: @noobie22 Noobie22
item.description:
@noobie22 wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]It’s a glitch in the combat.

It would happen anywhere.

Yes, a simple boolean would cause people to stop losing items in Varrock, but what about the rest of the world?

It’s the combat, not the city.[/quote]

I know that but he said it’s mainly happening in varrock. So just giving a simple fix would be the stupid thing to do, but it works.

He really should re write combat though not only for this glitch, it would really boost PvP

Read full topic

item.title: Players log in and Died
item.dc:creator: @noobie22 Noobie22
item.description:
@noobie22 wrote:

@Vain:

I know that, but he said people are dying at varrock, so if they die in varrock they don’t lose stuff so its a cheap fix.

Still works though.

Read full topic

item.description:
@noobie22 wrote:

Lordy, like I said make it so when they die in varrock they keep their stuff.

item.title: Players log in and Died
item.dc:creator: @lordy570 lordy570
item.description:
@lordy570 wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”][quote author=Noobie22 link=topic=450190.msg3302303#msg3302303 date=1281394505]
make so when they log in they’re hp is 99? and make it so when you die out of wild at edge, varrock w.e your home is you dont lose items.
[/quote]Doesn’t work.

@Topic; it’s a bug in Delta’s combat.

You must rewrite it.[/quote]
How can you tell me in steps?

Read full topic
